name: Fei Song
content: Fei Song | School of Computer Science Fei Song Associate ProfessorEmail: fsong@uoguelph.caPhone number: x58067Office: Reynolds 2225 Research Statement My research interests are mostly focused on applying Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence techniques to Natural Language Processing such as Document Classification, Information Retrieval, Topic Modeling, Sentiment Analysis, Text Summarization, Text Segmentation, and Temporal Analysis.
